item.description: 1.67.0 nightly # Unreleased Will be stable on: 26 January, 2023 Will branch from master on: 9 December, 2022 Remove drop order twist of && and || and make them associative (merged 5 days ago) Don’t build compiler_builtins with -C panic=abort (merged 12 days ago) Don’t set is_preview for clippy and rustfmt (merged 14 days ago) Fix inconsistent rounding of 0.5 when formatted to 0 decimal places (merged 23 days ago) Merge crossbeam-channel into std::sync::mpsc (merged 26 days ago) Make Sized coinductive, again (merged 28 days ago) Stabilize integer logarithms (merged 30 days ago) Derive Eq and Hash for ControlFlow (merged 37 days ago)

1.66.0 beta # Unreleased, branched from master Will be stable on: 15 December, 2022 Will branch from master on: 28 October, 2022 Do not consider repeated lifetime params for elision. (merged 41 days ago) Stabilize arbitrary_enum_discriminant, take 2 (merged 44 days ago) Stabilize duration_checked_float (merged 46 days ago) Don’t link to libresolv in libstd on Darwin (merged 46 days ago) Update libstd’s libc to 0.2.135 (to make libstd no longer pull in libiconv.
